message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on a price closer to $100?

I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I really think this product is worth more than $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. This is the lowest I can go, but I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still hoping to keep it within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price closer to $100?
